attributes.title: The Search for the Spy Master - #21

attributes.description: They are back! Heroes and Halfwits Gus, Geoff, Griffon, Ryan, Michael, and Dungeon Master Frank are in the city of Jackal Heart. Still separated into two teams, team one finds themselves stuck in an interrogation room. While team A is looking dapper in their new clothes and talking their way into the auction. Will they find the "Spy Master"?This episode is sponsored by Blue Apron

Bo Jingles and Bor Ealis continue to enact their plan to ambush the mayor of Ribcage. The rest of the party pose as revelers. Meanwhile, the constable's investigation into the salamander attack yields up some interesting answers.Sponsored by Blue Apron and Schooled
